## TextElement.dbgPathTooSmall property

 If `true`<!-- -->, the estimated bounding box of the path is too small for the label to fit, so it is being ignored for rendering in the latest frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dbgPathTooSmall?: boolean;
```
